reviewText:
This is THE BEST speech therapy DVD on the maklet, hands down. Second best would be baby bubble. My son, from 19 to now 27 months, is in love with the DVD. He learned words, phrases, and signs. Specifically, he says Thank you, Please, Good Job and some other polite words exactly from this video.
The video will be great for 17-36 month range, kids who need to expand single words vocabulary and learn phrases. It also shows lots of Signs.
